default_tone.description: Core Lofield FM voice shared by all presenters

spring.description: Lighter evenings, spring weather, back-to-normalcy energy
spring.tone_adjustment: Reference longer days, spring weather, renewed energy

summer.description: Long evenings, people actually going outside, occasionally nice weather
summer.tone_adjustment: Reference outdoor activities, holiday time, lighter evenings

autumn.description: Back-to-school energy, days getting shorter, cozy vibes
autumn.tone_adjustment: Reference darker evenings, back-to-school even though listeners aren't in school, cozy indoor time

winter.description: Dark evenings, cold weather, holiday season, seasonal affective disorder

ai_budget.description: Global AI resource limits to control costs and maintain sustainable operation
notes: Token budget covers LLM calls for presenter scripts and music prompt normalization
TTS budget limits total presenter speech time per hour
Music budget ensures we don't over-generate content (60-minute shows need ~40-45 min music)

streaming.description: Pre-generate content buffer and maintain fallback library for continuous operation
